original_text: The guards stood on the four sides of the Lord's house: the east, west, north and south sides.
korean_text: 이 문지기가 동, 서, 남, 북 사방에 섰고

sentences.original_text: The guards stood on the four sides
the east, west, north and south sides.
sentences.korean_translation: 동쪽, 서쪽, 북쪽, 그리고 남쪽 측면이다.
